text: aur qayaamat ke din to ham (bandon ke bhale bure aamaal taulane ke lie) insaaf kee taraazoo mein khadee kar denge to phir kisee shakhs par kuchh bhee zulm na kiya jaega aur agar raee ke daane ke baraabar bhee kisee ka (amal) hoga to tum use la haazir karenge aur ham hisaab karane ke vaaste bahut kaafee hain
